remarks: Express implication in terms of conjunction.  Theorem 3.4(27) of [Stoll] p. 176, with an added decidability condition.  The forward direction, ~ imanim , holds for all propositions, not just decidable ones. (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 25-Apr-2018.)
statement: imandc $p |- ( DECID ps -> ( ( ph -> ps ) <-> -. ( ph /\ -. ps ) ) ) $.
